title: Cloudflare acquires Astro
author: todotask2
aiHeadline: Cloudflare acquires Astro, proving that even in the tech world, sometimes you just need more stars in your life.

title: STFU
author: tanelpoder
aiHeadline: A new project called 'STFU' is making the internet a quieter place, one command at a time.

title: Just the Browser
author: cl3misch
aiHeadline: A browser that's just the browser? Radical idea: maybe we don't need 100 tabs open at once.

title: Cursor's latest “browser experiment” implied success without evidence
author: embedding-shape
aiHeadline: Cursor's latest browser experiment proves that sometimes, success is just a matter of implication, not actual evidence.

title: OpenBSD-current now runs as guest under Apple Hypervisor
author: gpi
aiHeadline: OpenBSD-current now runs under Apple's hypervisor, proving that even rebels can play nice with the system when forced.
